Company: Blue Cross Blue Shield of Nebraska
Description of incident: Blue Cross Blue Shield of Nebraska notified patients of a data breach when personal information was inadvertently disclosed on dental form claims. "The company said a printing error caused some  dental explanation of benefits forms to be sent to the wrong customers.  The forms reveal treatment and services that the insurer paid on a  customer’s behalf.The company said an internal review found that 1,872 dental plan  customers received mail statements that included another customer’s  name, member identification number and dental claim information. The  forms did not disclose birth dates, Social Security numbers, or  financial or employment information."More information: http://www.omaha.com/money/blue-cross-blue-shield-says-it-disclosed-cust...
